snippet.title: Sheaf - Together EP: VR Music Experience (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Enter virtual reality to listen to the debut EP “Together” of synthwave producer Sheaf. No gameplay involved -- just sit back, relax, and enjoy the music while you drive through a retro low poly world. Nostalgic fans of the 80's will not be disappointed with some smooth DX7 chords, melancholic synth work and pulsating bass lines. 

The EP features 3 tracks, and each track comes with its own scenery, tailor made to fit its mood. You can start each track separately from the main menu. 

“Together” (duration 3m20)
“Innervisions” (duration 3m00)
“Point Break” (duration 2m00)

OUT NOW ON 
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1072530/Sheaf__Together_EP/
OCULUS: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1621604147940095/
SOUNDCLOUD: https://soundcloud.com/sheafnl/sets/together-ep
SPOTIFY: https://open.spotify.com/album/2QKGEfJNA2SDpqe6e0PzTy?si=rozrcCQCTUuziPhkx1knrQ
BANDCAMP: https://sheaf.bandcamp.com/album/together


Links
SPOTIFY: https://open.spotify.com/artist/1Mxi9cImdVD7vmGotzmAW9?si=ISC017jFTiqyczcwoqGnmQ
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/sheaf_nl
